content.body: I wonder if "just" adding JSX to the syntax would cause any actual conflicts with the existing use of `<` for less-than comparisons? According to its [spec](https://facebook.github.io/jsx/), the JSXElement and JSXFragment are added as new PrimaryExpressions.
content.formatted_body: I wonder if "just" adding JSX to the syntax would cause any actual conflicts with the existing use of < for less-than comparisons? According to its spec, the JSXElement and JSXFragment are added as new PrimaryExpressions.
